TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_sasakamun_nu_nikalpacawan_i_Kaliwan_atu_nikalpacawan_i_Takubuwan,_cacay_henay_a_lasubu_sepat_a_bataan_a_mihcaan, title = sasakamun_nu_nikalpacawan_i_Kaliwan_atu_nikalpacawan_i_Takubuwan,_cacay_henay_a_lasubu_sepat_a_bataan_a_mihcaan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/sasakamun_nu_nikalpacawan_i_Kaliwan_atu_nikalpacawan_i_Takubuwan,_cacay_henay_a_lasubu_sepat_a_bataan_a_mihcaan} }

S.FORM: sipakayni i tusaay a binacadan tu sepatay a slalan ku tatangahan nu sasakamun. u caayay kalecat a binacadan a tu niyazu'. sakasasuayaw nikaydaan masasakamu a dadan nu balucu'. nikalpacawan i Kaliwan atu nikalpacawan i Takubuwan, cacay a lasubu sepat a bataan a mihcaan izaw ku tatusaay a binacadan a tatengilan i Kilaykin lalangawan nu binacadan a dabek i 107 a mihcan 9ay a bulad 23 a demiad. izaw ku sepatay a caay kalecad a mihcaan a tatangahan, tatusaay a binacadan namakayca i niyazuniyazu'ay a tademaw a musakamu. sakacacay a tatangahan: u nanuadidi' mauzip atu hicanan ku lalangawan nu maku. sakatusa a tatangahan: taniyazu', caay kataniyazu' haw? sakatulu a tatangahan: ayzaay atu sakacakatan anucilacila nu niyazu' sakasepat a tatangahan: i ayaw nu sapangangan atu zikud nipangangan nu binacadan a kawaw.

sipakayni i tosaay a binacadan to sepatay a slalan ko tatangahan no sasakamon. o caayay kalecat a binacadan a to niyazo'. sakasasoayaw nikaydaan masasakamo a dadan no baloco'. nikalpacawan i Kaliwan ato nikalpacawan i Takobowan, cacay a lasobo sepat a bataan a mihcaan izaw ko tatosaay a binacadan a tatengilan i Kilaykin lalangawan no binacadan a dabek i 107 a mihcan 9ay a bolad 23 a demiad. izaw ko sepatay a caay kalecad a mihcaan a tatangahan, tatosaay a binacadan namakayca i niyazoniyazo'ay a tademaw a mosakamo. sakacacay a tatangahan: o nanoadidi' maozip ato hicanan ko lalangawan no mako. sakatosa a tatangahan: taniyazo', caay kataniyazo' haw? sakatolo a tatangahan: ayzaay ato sakacakatan anocilacila no niyazo' sakasepat a tatangahan: i ayaw no sapangangan ato zikod nipangangan no binacadan a kawaw.
